GSGCarousel.name: Nima
GSGCarousel.text: Nima lost 20 kilos and now with her whole new energy levels, she keeps up with her super-active baby girl

GSGCarousel.name: Manisha Nambiar
GSGCarousel.text: Manisha lost 15 kilos post-pregnancy weight in 12 weeks and now loves eating a balanced diet.

GSGCarousel.name: Richa
GSGCarousel.text: From 90kgs to 68kgs, Richa overcame her post-delivery knee and back pain. She now manages her 2 kids and family with ease.

GSGCarousel.name: Simran
GSGCarousel.text: Simran shed over 10 kilos, learned in-depth about nutrition and now coaches other women to live a healthy life.

GSGCarousel.name: Somya
GSGCarousel.text: Somya was looking to get back to how she looked before her pregnancy. Losing over 10 kilos made it happen for her.

howDoesGetSetGoWorkTxt.mainHeading: But how does the GetSetGo Fitness online coaching work?

phases1.heading: Understanding your lifestyle
pointers: Identifying past and present challenges
Understanding your current eating habits, likes, dislikes, preferences, etc.
Understanding your stress levels, medical history, sleep patterns, nature of work, time constraints, and activity levels.

phases1.heading: Induction
pointers: Tweaking your current eating habits by 20-30% only to ensure a smooth start..
Introducing you to resistance training workouts based on your preference home/gym/outdoors.
Constant monitoring to hold you accountable and achieve consistency.

phases1.heading: Ownership
pointers: Guiding you to make better food choices on your own.
Guiding you to design your own meal plans and exercise regime.
One-on-one assessment by your coach to get you thorough with the concepts.

phases2.heading: Goal setting
pointers: Understanding your aspirations.
Setting realistic goals.
Setting short-term and long-term milestones.
Setting the right expectations.
Setting practical timelines to achieve your goals.

phases2.heading: Transition
pointers: Identifying loopholes and adopting strategies to ensure your progress keeps ticking.
Practical solutions to manage social gatherings/traveling etc.
Understanding calories, macros, and meal replacements.
Introducing exercise progressions.

phases2.heading: Reward and recognition
pointers: Celebrating your achievements in our exclusive member community
A chance to get interviewed by our CEO.
Rewarding your hard work through shopping vouchers, goodies, etc.
Featuring your transformation story on our blogs and social media to inspire other moms.

column1.title: No Strict Dieting
column1.text: Simple meal plans to lose weight! GetSetGo Fitness was built to make fitness easy and fun for you.

column1.title: Convenient Communication
column1.text: 24x7 whatsapp/email/call support to address your queries and challenges.

column2.title: Well- Trained Professionals
column2.text: Qualified fitness professionals trained in-house by our Co-Founders who are seasoned fitness coaches withover 10 years of coaching experience.

column2.title: Technology Driven
column2.text: Technology enabled coaching interface to give you a seamless experience.

column3.title: Personalized fitness coach
column3.text: Dedicated fitness coach to guide you on a weekly basis with a proper plan of action.

column3.title: Long term results
column3.text: Results that you can achieve and maintain for the long term.
